answers.answer: Hi there!Gastric upset is a common side effect of metformin and could be responsible for your symptoms, while other possibilities may need to be considered as well. I would suggest considering an evaluation by a primary care physician for a detailed evaluation and suggestion of an appropriate management plan.Hope this helps.Take care!

question: I am taking Metformin at 3000mgm per day for diabetes and I have pains in my lower chest is this related?
title: diabetes
